name: Bot Street Fight A
description:
VR non-interactive cinematic experience.

Developer
  • My Apps: Brad App List
  • My YouTube Channel: Brad Code Tips
Features
  • Maps: City Street
  • Slow motion
  • VR
Game Menu Menu
Esc/Ctrl + MResetSpaceToggle Post Process AA Quality 2/3Num - Description
  • This is a VR non-interactive cinematic experience.
Directions
  • Without a VR headset you can only look forward.
  • After you press Play it should detect your headset and switch to VR mode.
Notes
  • I could not test VR because I don't have a VR headset.
  • Showdown VR Demo was originally designed for Oculus DK2 and up, Sony PlayStation Morpheus, and HTC Vive SteamVR. I am not sure if other headsets are supported.
  • If anyone tries the game with a VR headset could you let me know in the comments if it works and what VR headset you used.
  • BotStreetFightA is based on Unreal Engine 4 Showdown VR Demo and not written by me. I made this so others can try the original as a ready to play download. Version A was intended to work with VR but it might not be working with VR because I could not test it. I planned version B to work with a keyboard & mouse.
  • 4.11 and 4.23 used difference versions of Showdown VR Demo. Version 4.23 would not load so I used 4.11.
Version 1.0
  • Known Bug: None.
Technical
  • Unreal Engine Version 4.11.2
Design
  • This game is based on Unreal Engine 4 Showdown VR Demo. 
Feedback

What did you like or dislike? Any feedback is appreciated.

Install Instructions

Download the ZIP file, unzip, and run the EXE file. No install is required.
